metadata.title: CVE-2024-23848 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel through 6.7.1, there is a use-after-free incec_queue_msg_fh, related to drivers/media/cec/core/cec-adap.c anddrivers/media/cec/core/cec-api.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
